Plot: When a man with AIDS is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.
Title: Philadelphia
Actors: Tom Hanks, Denzel Washington, Roberta Maxwell, Buzz Kilman
tomatoConsensus: Philadelphia indulges in some unfortunate clichés in its quest to impart a meaningful message, but its stellar cast and sensitive direction are more than enough to compensate.
